title: Liminal Architecture

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Select a player. They will be roleblocked and will visit you instead. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Any player who visits you will become empty. They will not learn that they are empty. Each night, every empty player will be roleblocked and will instead Basic attack a random player who is not empty and is not you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes you. (The empty players do not need to be killed.)

desc:
Post 5279
*You are here. The blank walls draw you in. The floors are a bleached white. Everything is old but nothing is broken. The void of the space makes you feel... empty. Hungry.*
